welcomeScreen.postscript: This might not be what your app looks like, unless your designer gave you these screens and charged you for them, in that case...
welcomeScreen.readyForLaunch: Your app is almost ready for launch

errorScreen.title: There's been a problem
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen users will see in production when there has been an error. You'll want to customise this message (in 'app/i18n/translations.ts' and possibly the screen design too in 'app/screens/ErrorScreen.tsx'). If you want to remove this altogether, check out 'app/app.tsx' for the <ErrorBoundary> component.

generic.heading: So empty... so lonely
generic.content: There's no data yet. Try clicking the button to refresh or reload.

SignIn.title: Sign In
SignIn.noAccount: Don't have an account? Create one
SignIn.EmailError: Please enter a valid email address

ObjectiveSupPageOne.title: What's your Goal ?
ObjectiveSupPageOne.subtitle: Tell us what you're aiming for, and we'll help you get there.

ObjectiveSupPageTwo.title: How Active are you ?
ObjectiveSupPageTwo.labelFour: Very active: hard exercise/sports 6-7 days a week
ObjectiveSupPageTwo.subtitle: This will help us determine your daily calorie needs.

ObjectiveSupPageThree.subtitleGender: Calorie needs depends on the gender.
